title: Generalization of some of Ramanujan's formulae
abstract:
We shall make use of the method of partial fractions to generalize some of
Ramanujan's infinite series identities, including Ramanujan's famous formula
for $\zeta(2n+1)$, and we shall also give a generalization of the
transformation formula for the logarithm of the Dedekind eta function. It is
shown here that the method of partial fractions can be used to obtain many
similar identities of this kind.
